data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garzón-Orduña, Ivonne J., Penz, Carla M. (2009): Phylogeny of Dynastor and Brassolis butterflies (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae): a tough nut to crack. Zootaxa 2134: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188448
